shop.title: AIR ZOOM PEGASUS
shop.description: A pair of round-toe black & beige sneakers, has regular styling, lace-up detail Mesh upper Webbing pull tabs are offset and designed to stay open, so they're easier to use when putting on your shoes. A padded collar with internal nodes provides comfort around your Achilles tendon. A moulded groove in the forefoot helps the shoe flex. Rubber outsole pods provide traction. Cushioned footbed. Textured and patterned outsole
